name: Danube
hint: Second-longest European river, flows through four capitals

name: Rhine
hint: Major Western European river flowing from Swiss Alps to the North Sea

name: Thames
hint: River flowing through London, England

name: Seine
hint: River flowing through the heart of Paris, France

name: Volga
hint: Longest river in Europe, flowing through central Russia to the Caspian Sea

name: Elbe
hint: Major Central European river flowing through Hamburg to the North Sea

name: Loire
hint: Longest river in France, famous for its valley castles

name: Po
hint: Longest river in Italy, flowing east across the northern plain

name: Tagus
hint: Longest river on the Iberian Peninsula, flowing through Lisbon

name: Dnieper
hint: Fourth-longest European river, flowing through Kyiv, Ukraine

name: Rhone
hint: Major French river flowing from the Swiss Alps through Lyon to the Mediterranean

name: Vistula
hint: Longest river in Poland, flowing through Warsaw and Krakow to the Baltic Sea

name: Don
hint: Major Russian river flowing into the Sea of Azov, featured in Sholokhov's novels

name: Douro
hint: River flowing through Porto, famous for port wine vineyards along its terraced valley

name: Tiber
hint: River flowing through Rome, upon whose banks the ancient city was founded

name: Oder
hint: River forming much of the border between Germany and Poland

name: Guadalquivir
hint: Major river of southern Spain flowing through Cordoba and Seville to the Atlantic

name: Shannon
hint: Longest river in Ireland and the British Isles, flowing into the Atlantic Ocean

name: Arno
hint: Tuscan river flowing through Florence, crossed by the famous Ponte Vecchio bridge

name: Danube Delta
hint: Europe's best-preserved river delta in Romania, a UNESCO biosphere reserve for wildlife
